title: Asymptotic Classification Error for Heavy-Tailed Renewal Processes
abstract:
Despite the widespread occurrence of classification problems and the
increasing collection of point process data across many disciplines, study of
error probability for point process classification only emerged very recently.
Here, we consider classification of renewal processes. We obtain asymptotic
expressions for the Bhattacharyya bound on misclassification error
probabilities for heavy-tailed renewal processes.
